form.name: form1

div.span: State-Mandated School Closure

span.center: The Kirtland Local Schools will close at the end of the school day on March 13 and remain closed through May 1.

div.span: Congratulations KMS FLL Team!

KMS FIRST Lego League team Buzz Buzz, Sting Sting was awarded the Motivate Award at the University of Akron District Competition and was invited to attend the State FLL Competition in Dayton on February 1st and 2nd.

img.alt: KMS Robotics Team Qualifies for State

div.span: Congratulations Kirtland Football Team!
Congratulations to our Kirtland Hornets on winning the Division V State Championship! We are so proud of you and of all the hard work that helped you earn your second straight State Title.
Kirtland Local Schools Strategic Plan
During the 2017-18 school year, we developed a Strategic Plan for our district. This plan outlines our mission, vision, and four goals that will guide our work moving forward.
Thank you KHS Family!
A big thank you to the entire Kirtland High School family for supporting our student athletes this season!
Congratulations to our Regional Champion Girls Soccer Team!
Congratulations to our Girls Soccer Team on an amazing season and a great run in the DIII OHSAA State Playoffs! We are very proud of your accomplishments and the hard work it took to earn them.

img.alt: Girls Soccer Team Breaks for a Goal

div.span: KMS and KHS Students Working Together at KAA
Kirtland Academic Academy provides middle school students the opportunity to work with National Honor Society members from KHS.
KES Earns Gold Medal from Superintendent DeMaria
KES recently received a PBIS Gold Medal from Ohio Superintendent of Public Education Paolo DeMaria.
Special Visitors to KES on Veterans Day
Thank you to all of our veterans who have given their time and risked their lives to defend our great country!
Kirtland Local Schools Strategic Plan
The process of creating our new vision statement included students, parents, community members, teachers, staff, and administrators. With their help, we identified the practices in which we believe.
Kirtland Schools Honored as a Taxpayer Hero
Ohio Auditor Dave Yost presented a Taxpayer Hero Award to Kirtland Local School District on March 12 in recognition of the district’s successful cost savings through a variety of initiatives.

img.alt: Kirtland Schools Earns the Taxpayer Hero Award

h3.a: Become a Collaborator with Kirtland Schools

div.span: We are very excited to share our Quality Profile as a companion piece to our State report card and as a part of our overall communication plan.
